message: So way back in the day I always thought I'd be the "hit the store every week" kinda guy. Moving to LA has changed that, in spite of the fact that I have a bunch of great stores near me. I just find myself more interested in reading collections than I do in keeping up with the weekly releases. And it doesn't help that the collections are looking sooo pretty these days. Did you SEE Batwoman: Elegy? I rest my case.
